section.37: The Book of Clothes and Adornment

hadiths.text: Anas b. Malik reported to them (his companions) that Allah's Messnger (ï·º) had granted concession to Abd al-Rahman b. *Anf and Zubair b. 'Awwam for the wearing of a silk shirt during the journey and because of itch which they both had or any other disease from which both of them had been suffering
